[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]Overview[/h1] The Cyberpunk mod adds elements of the Cyberpunk 2020 RPG game to RimWorld. It includes the following:
- New guns and melee weapons - New armors, helmets and apparel added, many with new graphics. - New cybernetic implants added - Gun reliability and jamming - Includes Pardeike's Harmony library
If you like this mod, try the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2846910032]Cyberpunk Factions[/url] expansion. It adds several corps to the game in addition to the outlanders. I also suggest using the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=735241897]Mending[/url] Mod, which will allow you to fix and maintain your guns, as well as clean up the gear from your fallen enemies to make them usable again.
[b]There is always the possibility that this mod has bugs. Please report any issues that you might run into[/b]
All current and past versions of this mod can be downloaded from GitHub.
[h1]Contributors[/h1] - Andreas Pardeike: Harmony library + help with muscle graft code
